constantValues: Vehicle or device that a customer wants to use as part of payment buying another one (new or used).

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: appraisalSource

constantValues: Name of the entity that provided the appraisal valuation.

members.description: Name of the entity that provided the appraisal valuation.

members.name: appraisedValue

constantValues: Estimated value as provided by the appraiser.

members.description: Estimated value as provided by the appraiser.

members.name: appraisedValueBase

constantValues: Value of the appraised value in base currency.

members.description: Value of the appraised value in base currency.

value.name: dealId

constantValues: Sales deal associated with the trade in.

value.description: Sales deal associated with the trade in.

value.name: deviceId

constantValues: The specific automobile that is to be purchased in this deal.

value.description: The specific automobile that is to be purchased in this deal.

members.name: offerPrice

constantValues: The offer price of the deal.

members.description: The offer price of the deal.

members.name: offerPriceBase

constantValues: Value of the offer price in base currency.

members.description: Value of the offer price in base currency.

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Trade In
